alert.note: Alert for Larimer (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:26PM MDT until August 06 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LARIMER COUNTY... At 425 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Kinikinik, or 41 miles south of Laramie, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Kinikinik around 430 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Brief heavy rainfall is also possible, and may lead to localized flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
